title: Fragments [2], 1978-168-13-a,b, 18th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs
description: Two fragments of woven fabric: offset rows of small flowers [alternate rows counterfaced] on top of violet stripes on a yellow background patterned with tiny yellow flowers.  Heigth of full repeat 2.3 cm. [7/8"].
